greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Product of omega(n) and bigomega(n) = A001221(n)*A001222(n), where omega(x): number of distinct prime divisors of x. bigomega(x): number of prime divisors of x, counted with multiplicity.
comment: Positions of first appearances are A328964. - _Gus Wiseman_, Nov 05 2019
link: G. C. Greubel, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..1000
results.author: _Cino Hilliard_, Jan 29 2006
